quoteText: Subject to the arbitration provisions above, and other than small claims actions as permitted therein, any action or proceeding arising from, relating to or in connection with these Terms will be brought exclusively in the federal or state courts located in New York, New York, and you irrevocably consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts and agree that it is a convenient forum and that you will not seek to transfer such action or proceeding to any other forum or jurisdiction, under the doctrine of <u>forum nonconveniens</u> or otherwise.
title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
